languages.text: {n}Мрачная улыбка озаряет лицо священнослужителя, он творит знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}.{/n} "Надеюсь, они страдали сообразно своим грехам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мрачная улыбка озаряет лицо священнослужителя, он творит знак аквилы.{/n} "Надеюсь, они страдали сообразно своим грехам".

languages.text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."
languages.original_text: {n}Мрачная улыбка озаряет лицо священнослужителя, он творит знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}.{/n} "Надеюсь, они страдали сообразно своим грехам".

traits.locale_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the Sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their sins."
{n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the Sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their sins."
{n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their sins."
{n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their sins."
{n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

languages.text: {n}他做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势，脸上露出了严峻的微笑，连面容都变得精神焕发。{/n}“我希望他们受到的痛苦与他们的恶行相称。”
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}他做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}手势，脸上露出了严峻的微笑，连五官都变得明亮起来。{/n}“我希望他们受到的痛苦与他们的罪行相称。”

languages.text: {n}Una adusta sonrisa resalta sus facciones. Hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} «Espero que el sufrimiento fuera proporcional a sus crímenes».
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una adusta sonrisa resalta sus facciones. Hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} «Espero que el sufrimiento fuera proporcional a sus pecados».

languages.text: {n}彼は不敵な笑みを浮かべ、{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を描いた。{/n}「行いに見合う苦しみを奴らに与えたことを願います」
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は不敵な笑みを浮かべ、{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を描いた。{/n}「罪に見合う苦しみを奴らに与えたことを願います」

languages.text: {n}Ein grimmiges Lächeln erhellt seine Gesichtszüge, und er macht das Zeichen des{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}.{/n} "Hoffentlich entsprach ihr Leid dem Ausmaß ihrer Taten."
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein grimmiges Lächeln erhellt seine Gesichtszüge, und er macht das Zeichen des{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}.{/n} "Hoffentlich entsprach ihr Leid dem Ausmaß ihrer Sünden."

languages.text: {n}Un sombre sourire éclaire son visage, et il fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} « J'espère que leur souffrance aura été à la hauteur de leurs méfaits. »
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sombre sourire éclaire son visage, et il fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} « J'espère que leur souffrance aura été à la hauteur de leurs péchés. »

languages.text: {n}Yüzünde gaddarca bir gülümseme beliriyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Umarım çektikleri acı da yaydıkları kötülüğe yaraşır olmuştur."
languages.original_text: {n}A grim smile brightens his features, and he makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "I hope that their suffering was commensurate with their deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünde gaddarca bir gülümseme beliriyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Dilerim çektikleri acılar yaptıkları kötülüklerle doğru orantılıdır."
